      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>d1ef6ade-f32e-4805-8121-0a61bacfcce9#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Huszár trombitás gyalog (1790)</string>
            <string language="en">Man with hussar bugle on foot (1790)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mann mit hussar Signalhorn auf Fuß (1790)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Homme avec la bugle hussar à pied (1790)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Homem com o bugle hussar no pé (1790)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uomo con la bugola hussar a piedi (1790)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ατομο με τη σάλπιγγα ουσάρων με τα πόδια (1790)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hombre con el bugle hussar a pie (1790)</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Kékruhás trombitás háttal, kalapban (1-2)</string>
            <string language="en">Trumpeter dressed in blue wearing a hat shown from the rear (1-2)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">trombitás piros tollforgó németes,  </string>
            <string language="en">trumpeter red panache German-like</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trumpeter kleidete im Blau an, das einen Hut 
trägt, der von der Rückseite (1-2) gezeigt wurde</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trumpeter s'est habillé dans le bleu portant un 
chapeau montré de l'arrière (1-2)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trumpeter vestiu-se no azul que desgasta um 
chapéu mostrado da parte traseira (1-2)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trumpeter si è vestito in azzurro che porta un 
cappello indicato dalla parte posteriore (1-2)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Trumpeter που ντύνεται στο μπλε που φορά ένα 
καπέλο που εμφανίζεται από το οπίσθιο τμήμα (12)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trumpeter vistió en el azul que desgastaba un 
sombrero mostrado de la parte posterior (1-2)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">trumpeter rotes panache Deutsch-wie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">panache rouge de trumpeter Allemand-comme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">panache vermelho do trumpeter Alemão-como</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">panache rosso del trumpeter Tedesco-come</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">trumpeter κόκκινο λοφίο γερμανικός-όπως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">panache rojo del trumpeter Alema'n-como</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
